content:
The Flow Rider Pro AM competition will be kicking off July 8th at 1PM with amatuers and professionals showing off their tricks, flips, and wipeouts to compete for the top 3 finalist prizes.

Professional and amatuer sign ups are due 48 hours in advance, and spectator tickets are only $5 and can be purchased at the door the day of the event.

  • View More Information
